B

Bag<T> - Class in ds.util
This class implements the Collection interface as a user-specified finite array; random access to an element is provided by the grab method.
Bag(int) - Constructor for class ds.util.Bag
Constructs an empty bag with a specified capacity.
bfs(DiGraph<T>, T) - Static method in class ds.util.DiGraphs
Performs the breadth-first traversal from sVertex and returns the list of visited vertices.
BinaryTree - Class in ds.util
This class contains methods for the classic binary tree traversal algorithms, console and graphical tree display methods, and miscellaneous methods to build binary trees.
BinaryTree() - Constructor for class ds.util.BinaryTree
 
binSearch(int[], int, int, int) - Static method in class ds.util.Arrays
Searches an integer array for the specified target value using the binary search algorithm.
binSearch(T[], int, int, T) - Static method in class ds.util.Arrays
Searches the sublist [first, last) in a specified array of objects for the specified target value using the binary search algorithm; the generic type T must implement the Comparable interface with the array sorted in ascending order; comparison is made using the equals() method; the return value is the first occurrence of a match or -1 if not match is found.
bit(int) - Method in class ds.util.BitArray
Returns the value of bit i in this bit array.
BitArray - Class in ds.util
This class has objects that support bit handling for a large array of bytes.
BitArray(int) - Constructor for class ds.util.BitArray
Creates a bit array consisting of numBits bits each having value 0.
BitArray(int[]) - Constructor for class ds.util.BitArray
Creates a bit array consisting of bit values from the integer array b.
BLACK - Static variable in class ds.graphics.Shape
The color black.
BLUE - Static variable in class ds.graphics.Shape
The color blue.
BQueue<T> - Class in ds.util
This class implements a finite queue using a circular queue model to store and retrieve elements.
BQueue() - Constructor for class ds.util.BQueue
Creates an empty queue that holds a maximum of 50 elements with the specified generic type T.
BQueue(int) - Constructor for class ds.util.BQueue
Creates an empty queue that has a specified fixed size for elements with the specified generic type T.
buildExpTree(String) - Static method in class ds.util.BinaryTree
Builds binary expression tree that corresponds to operators and operands in a postfix expression.
buildTime24Tree() - Static method in class ds.util.BinaryTree
Builds a 9-node binary trees with Time24 data and returns the root.
buildTree(int) - Static method in class ds.util.BinaryTree
Builds three different binary trees with Character data and returns the root; the integer argument n in the range 0 to 2 designates the tree.
